title: When will the UP NTSE Stage 1 2019 result be declared? - Quora

response.answer_text: Sorry I don't have any idea of the exact date but roughly speaking most of the states including UP will declare their results within 3rd week of February. And by the way all the best for your results!!! If you have any other query please feel free to ask me. If you wish you can also follow me on quora.
response.upvotes: Answer requested by Ram Dayal Chaudhary

response.answer_text: Result of Uttar Pradesh NTSE Stage I 2018-19 Exam Regulatory Authority Uttar Pradesh, Allahabadhas issued the NTSE Stage I 2018-19 results Total Number of Selections - 755Highest Marks scored - 192Cut off for the General Category - 175Cut off for OBC Category - 162Cut off for SC Category - 152Cut off for ST Category - 112
response.upvotes: Answer requested by Shashank Choudhary and Vibhor Sharma
